description: And easy date paste recipe using only 4 simple ingredients to make this all natural sweetener! Plus a bonus option for all your baking needs.
name: Easy Date Paste Recipe
recipeIngredient: 24 pitted Medjool dates (, about 2 cups packed (a little over a pound, see notes)
3/4 - 1 1/4 cup almond/cashew/etc milk (, start with 3/4 and add more to get the consistency you want)
3/4 - 1 1/4 cup water (, start with 3/4 and add more to get the consistency you want)

recipeInstructions.text: If using a regular blender, make sure to soak your dates in hot water for about 30 minutes before you make it so that they soften enough to get a smooth result.
If using a high speed blender, put all ingredients inside and blend on high until smooth. You may need to stop and shake a little to get things moving but they will if you keep going.
